1.0.name: wordpress/mechanic-post-by-category
1.0.description: Mechanic post by category is widget to display summary post or aticle sort by category. Easy to use, install, setup and come with several options to control how it looks on your wordpress website. Display the most recent posts from a certain category. some Feature is Summary post, title post, and number of post to display in to sidebar or footer. You can make a lot of post widgets to each category. and displays them based on the category that you choose.
